name: Chan Hua Jian
quote: Mobile App Developer, has a strong desire to create applications in the industry. Mechanical keyboards enthusiast.
aboutMe: As a mobile developer, I have developed several mobile apps, ranging from healthcare to finance. I have been actively participated in the development of Superapps and its miniapps. Currently, my primary focus revolves around on Flutter, Swift and React JS.

work.description: Implemented new features for mobile applications and shipped to App Store/Play Store, integrated python to mobile apps, currently working on Superapp development. Technologies: Flutter, Swift, Kotlin, React JS

Created admin portal front-end screens with the team with high performance, security and quality, in charge of mapping multiple APIs data, and managed to give a presentation of the product developed with the team to the key stakeholders from Singapore. Technologies: Low-code platform

projects.title: Minimalist CV
